    • Constructor Detail

      • SearchRoute

        public SearchRoute()
        Create a new LotRoute, without Authorisation token. Search doesn't require Authentication.

    • Method Detail

      • addFilter

        public void addFilter(Filter filter,
                      java.lang.Object value)
        Adds a parameter to the search operation
        Parameters:
        filter - the filter to be added
        value - value of the filter to be added. String.valueOf() of this Object is used for the search.

      • removeFilter

        public void removeFilter(Filter filter)
        Removes a parameter from the search operation
        Parameters:
        filter - removes this filter from the parameters

      • clearFilters

        public void clearFilters()
        Clears all parameters from the search operation

      • doSearch

        public java.util.List<Lot> doSearch()
                             throws LEX4JStatusException
        Performs the search operation based on filters that are currently active
        Returns:
        List of Lots
        Throws:
        LEX4JStatusException - if the server returns an error
